title: 7 Morning Prayers Your Kids Will Love to Pray
text:
By Mary Fairchild Updated February 06, 2017 . 
Try teaching your Christian child these morning prayers. They will enjoy learning and praying these simple prayers with rhyme and rhythm. Children's Morning Prayer 
Lord, in the morning I start each day,By taking a moment to bow and pray.I start with thanks, and then give praiseFor all your kind and loving ways. 
Today if sunshine turns to rain,If a dark cloud brings some pain,I won't doubt or hide in fearFor you, my God, are always near. 
I will travel where you lead;I will help my friends in need.Where you send me, I will go;With your help, I'll learn and grow . 
Hold my family in your hands,As we follow your commands .And I will keep you close in sightUntil I crawl in bed tonight. 
Amen.
